title: Ep 42: No Tall Men
description:
Today's proceedings:  We announce new merch available NOW, designed by Christian! SHEEESH! We also delve into the possibility of #NotAllMen are garbage (spoiler alert, they are).  A man gives his girlfriend's brother some dating advice, a man is upset with his girlfriend's old look, a hook up session goes wrong after an interruption, and a teen mistakes his girlfriend's mom for some one else.  We also delve into our horoscopes from the day of recording as well as in 1979! 

Get your Sheesh Merch here! 

http://etsy.com/shop/Judgiespodcast 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod  

 Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod   

Music by: Iván  

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg   

Logo/Designs by:  

https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
